Name: Control
Expression: TM1SubsetToSet([SLS_SALES_PLAN_IND] , IIF([zSELECT].(STRTOMEMBER((("[}Clients].[" + USERNAME)) + "]"),[zSELECT_IND].[Control_Type]) = "Volume without Price" , "VolumeWithoutPrice" ,  IIF([zSELECT].(STRTOMEMBER((("[}Clients].[" + USERNAME)) + "]"),[zSELECT_IND].[Control_Type]) = "Negative Volume" , "NegativeVolume" , "NegativePrice")))
